mapper.select: select a.cart_idx,a.cart_cnt,a.midx,b.p_idx,b.p_content,b.p_name,b.p_discount,b.p_disprice,b.p_price,c.p_front_img,c.p_ori_filename,c.p_sys_filename from cart a left outer join product b on a.p_idx = b.p_idx left outer join product_img c on b.p_idx = c.p_idx where midx=#{midx};
select count(*) from cart where midx=#{midx}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_cnt=#{cart_cnt} where midx=#{midx} and cart_idx=#{cart_idx};
